summary:
- Led Data/AI research team, developed Japanese corpus, and built text classification model for upcoming projects.
- Designed NER model, OCR, and text anonymization system for processing Japanese text efficiently.
- Conducted machine learning training for engineers, enhancing team's skills and knowledge.
- Refactored and maintained web application for digital forensic data reviews.

- Developed and maintained features for stores management web application using Laravel and Vue.
- Facilitated communication between Japanese and English speakers in global engineering teams.
- Collaborated with management to ensure smooth operations and project delivery.

- Took part in various projects including:
  - Web application development for visualizing environment data captured by IoT system using Vue/Angular.js and Laravel.
  - Migration of legacy web application bundler to Webpack for improving development productivity.
  - Design and implementation of migration of embedded web application for configuring audio device to AWS.
